DOC.brief_summary: The whole study divide two major part : ( A ) 12-week , double-blind , randomize control , parallel omega-3 fatty acid monotherapy study 60 patient mild moderate major depressive disorder . ( B ) The double-blind , randomize control , parallel omega-3 fatty acid add-on prevention study 60 patient major depressive disorder recovery status . The goal study examine therapeutic recurrence prevention effect omega-3 fatty acid major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Fish Oil Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: 1 . DSMIV criterion major depressive disorder . 2 . Age age 1865 . 3 . Capacity willingness give write informed consent . 1 . Any major medical illness . 2 . A recent past history AxisI diagnose besides major depressive disorder , include psychotic disorder ; cognitively impair mental disorder ; impulse control disorder ; substance use disorder substance abuse ( last 6 month prior study ) ; primary anxiety disorder , include posttraumatic stress disorder panic disorder ; bipolar disorder ; AxisII diagnose , i.e . borderline antisocial personality disorder .
